chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: Liferay Faces Bridge is a JAR that JSF developers can add as a dependency to their portlet WAR projects in order to deploy JSF web applications as portlets within JSR 286 (Portlet 2.0) compliant portlet containers like Liferay Portal 5.2, 6.0, and 6.1.
The project home page can be found at http://www.liferay.com/community/liferay-projects/liferay-faces/bridge
